article: Do you know who invented tea? It is said that the emperor Shen Nong discovered tea when he was boiling drinking water  _  an open fire. Some leaves from a nearby tree fell into the water and the leaves were in the water for  some time  . The emperor noticed that the leaves in the water produced a  _  smell. Later he decided  to taste  the hot water with the leaves. It was quite delicious. And  in this way  , one of the worl's favorite drinks was invented.  _  is the home of tea. And tea has more than 4,000 years history.  _  the three drinks--tea, coffee and cocoa, tea is drunk by  the largest number of  people in the world. Tea  _  China began to be known by the world over a thousand years ago and has been an important Chinese export  since then  . Tea leaves  are produced  mainly in the south of the Yangtze River,  becauuse of  the warm climate there. Longjing, Wulong, Pu'er and Tieguanyin are all  _  kinds of tea. Over the past centuries, Chinese people  have developed  their tea culture , including tea planting, tea-leaf picking, tea making and so on. We know tea is  also  a popular topic in dances, songs, poems and novels.
